title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values from the table are displayed inconsistently between dynamic text items and data/text items.
OB: When retrieving datetime values from the table and displaying them in dynamic text items, the format appears different compared to the display in data/text items. This inconsistency in formatting is causing confusion and may lead to misinterpretation of the data.
EB: Datetime values should maintain a consistent format when displayed, regardless of whether they are shown in dynamic text items or data/text items. Users expect a uniform presentation of datetime information throughout the application.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a dynamic text item on a form.
2. Insert a data/text item on the same form.
3. Populate the table with datetime values.
4. Ensure the dynamic text item and data/text item both retrieve and display datetime values.
5. Observe the discrepancy in formatting between the two items.
